item.title: Uploading Files to Slack using Node.js
item.description: This sample script is for uploading files to Slack. fs.createReadStream() can be used as a file for uploading to Slack. Even if filetype is not defined, the uploaded file is used automatically as a png file. Sample script : var fs = require('fs'); var request = require('request'); request.post({ url: 'https://slack.com/api/files.upload', formData: { file: fs.createReadStream('sample.png'), token: '### access token ###', filetype: 'png', filename: 'samplefilename', channels: 'sample', title: 'sampletitle', }, }, function(error, response, body) { console.

item.title: GAS Library - SOUWA_GAS - Effects on Optimized Codes of Pyramid Method
item.description: Kanshi TANAIKE Abstract I have already reported that the pyramid method is one of very effectively algolithms for summing string elements in an array using Google Apps Script (GAS). This report describes the adaptability of the pyramid method to any languages except for GAS. c++ (g++), Go, Java, Javascript on Node.js, Python and Ruby were chosen as the sample languages. In those languages, there are languages which have the distinctive commands for summing the array elements.
